item.name: Get Issue Link Types by Project

query.value: project="{{sourceProjectKey}}" AND attachments IS NOT EMPTY
project="{{sourceProjectKey}}" AND issueLinkType IS NOT EMPTY
project="{{sourceProjectKey}}" AND fixVersion IS NOT EMPTY

item.name: Get Issue Types by Project Id

query.value: project="{{targetProjectKey}}" AND issueLinkType IS NOT EMPTY

item.name: Get Editable Fields for Issue Key

query.value: project="{{targetProjectKey}}" AND attachments IS NOT EMPTY
